title: Can I charge my pixel 3 phone with MacBooks(2018) charger?
content:
I bought my previous pixel 3 phone 2 months ago, and I was charging it mostly using my macBooks charger. And surprisingly 2 weeks ago it stopped charging from any source except power banks.
After giving broken phone to repair service, they gave me a new phone. And now I am wondering, was my previous phone was broken because I have used Macbooks charger or was it just coincidence.
I just don't want to break a new one.
Thank you in advance!
